content.raw:
I tested the logging server with our system and it seems to work fine except for one thing I am wondering about:

When opening for example blacs or labscript, one \(for runmanager\) or several \(for blacs\) files are created named “test\_can\_create\_file-xyz“ where xyz is a long list of numbers and letters looking like some tag. Which part does create this file? It also seems to have no content.
content.html:
I tested the logging server with our system and it seems to work fine except for one thing I am wondering about:

When opening for example blacs or labscript, one (for runmanager) or several (for blacs) files are created named “test_can_create_file-xyz“ where xyz is a long list of numbers and letters looking like some tag. Which part does create this file? It also seems to have no content.
